events.message: I recently received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product delivered does not match what I purchased.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery reported by the customer.
Customer support agent Jane Smith has been assigned to handle the refund request case for the customer.
Hello! I’m Jane from customer support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number? This will help us process your refund quickly.
I have attached the photo of the wrong product and my order number is 123456789. Please let me know the next steps for the refund.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a return label via email to send the incorrect item back at no cost.
Thanks for the quick response! I’m happy to hear the refund will be processed right away and appreciate the free return label.
The refund process is now completed and a confirmation email has been sent. Please ship the incorrect item back using the provided label.
Just checking in to confirm you have successfully returned the item and are satisfied with the refund process. Let us know if you need further assistance.
Since the refund has been issued and the return received, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and for contacting support.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience to help us improve our service.
